mapper.select: /* getListSdoExceptGeom */ SELECT A.bjcd, SUBSTR(A.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, A.name FROM sk_sdo A, ( SELECT MIN(ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, name FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn ='Y' GROUP BY name ) B WHERE A.ogc_fid = B.ogc_fid ORDER BY A.name

/* getListSggBySdoExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 3, 3) AS sgg_code, B.name FROM sk_sgg B, ( SELECT MIN(A.ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, A.code AS bjcd, A.name FROM ( SELECT ogc_fid, SUBSTR(bjcd, 1, 5) as code, name FROM sk_sgg WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || '%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.name ) C WHERE B.ogc_fid = C.ogc_fid ORDER BY C.name

/* getListEmdBySdoAndSggExceptGeom */ SELECT B.bjcd, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 1, 2) AS sdo_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 3, 3) AS sgg_code, SUBSTR(B.bjcd, 6, 3) AS emd_code, B.name FROM sk_emd B, ( SELECT MIN(A.ogc_fid) AS ogc_fid, A.code AS bjcd, A.name FROM ( SELECT ogc_fid, SUBSTR(bjcd, 6, 3) as code, name FROM sk_emd WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND bjcd LIKE #{sdoCode} || #{sggCode} ||'%' ) A GROUP BY A.code, A.name ) C WHERE B.ogc_fid = C.ogc_fid ORDER BY C.name

/* getDistrictTotalCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT name FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT name FROM sk_sgg WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT name FROM sk_emd WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ) A

/* getListDistrict */ SELECT bjcd AS id, name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_sdo WHERE enable_yn = 'Y' AND name LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT B.bjcd AS id, A.name||' ' || B.name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(B.wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(B.wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_sgg B LEFT JOIN sk_sdo A on SUBSTR(A.bjcd,1,2) = SUBSTR(B.bjcd,1,2) WHERE B.enable_yn = 'Y' AND B.name LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT C.bjcd AS id, A.name||' ' || B.name ||' '|| C.name as name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(C.wkb_geometry)) AS longitude, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(C.wkb_geometry)) AS latitude FROM sk_emd C LEFT JOIN sk_sdo A on SUBSTR(A.bjcd,1,2) = SUBSTR(C.bjcd,1,2) LEFT JOIN sk_sgg B on SUBSTR(B.bjcd,1,5) = SUBSTR(C.bjcd,1,5) WHERE C.enable_yn = 'Y' AND C.name like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY name OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
